diff_hunk:

         try:
             r = index_queue.get(timeout=MANAGER_STATUS_CHECK_INTERVAL)
         except queue.Empty:
-            if watchdog.is_alive():
+            if watchdog.is_alive() and not done_event.is_set():
                 continue
             else:
                 break
-        if r is None:
+        # use done_event so that we can get faster exiting signal even if there

body: Does this serve any purpose other than to make them exit faster? If yes, I'd rather not use it, as it complicates the whole protocol for no good reason.
